postcodelabel.fieldDescription: Label for Post Code Example: Postcode
postcodelabel.name: ./postCodeLabel

postcodeplaceholder.fieldDescription: Placeholder Text for Post Code Example: Enter your postcode
postcodeplaceholder.name: ./postCodePlaceholder

housenumberlabel.fieldDescription: Label for House number Example: House number
housenumberlabel.name: ./houseNumberLabel

housenumberplaceholder.fieldDescription: Placeholder Text for House number Example: Enter your House number
housenumberplaceholder.name: ./houseNumberPlaceholder

searchaddresslabel.fieldDescription: Label for Search Address Button Example: Search address
searchaddresslabel.name: ./searchAddressLabel

enteraddressmanually.fieldDescription: Label for Manual Address Search Button Example: Enter your address manually ?
enteraddressmanually.name: ./enterAddressManually

keyinaddress.fieldDescription: Helper Text that will appear in Mobile for Address Key In details Example : Key in your postal code and house number to find your address
keyinaddress.name: ./keyInAddress
keyinaddress.value: Key in your postal code and house number to find your address

addresslistmodalheading.fieldDescription: Heading for Modal that shows Search Results Example: Search result
addresslistmodalheading.name: ./addressListModalHeading

streetplaceholder.fieldDescription: Placeholder Text for Street Example: Enter your street name
streetplaceholder.name: ./streetPlaceholder

cityplaceholder.fieldDescription: Placeholder Text for City Example: Enter your city
cityplaceholder.name: ./cityPlaceholder

continuebuttonlabel.fieldDescription: Label for Countinue Button Example: Continue
continuebuttonlabel.name: ./continueButtonLabel

streetcharlimiterrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: The street name can have a maximum of 56 alphanumeric characters.
streetcharlimiterrormessage.name: ./streetCharLimitErrorMessage
streetcharlimiterrormessage.value: The street name can have a maximum of 56 alphanumeric characters.

streetinvalidcharerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Invalid street name. Please enter your street.
streetinvalidcharerrormessage.name: ./streetInvalidCharErrorMessage
streetinvalidcharerrormessage.value: Invalid street name. Please enter your street.

streetemptyerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Please enter your street. This field is mandatory.
streetemptyerrormessage.name: ./streetEmptyErrorMessage
streetemptyerrormessage.value: Please enter your street. This field is mandatory.

housenumbercharlimiterrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Your house number can have a maximum of 25 characters. Please enter your house number.
housenumbercharlimiterrormessage.fieldLabel: House Number Character Limit Error Message
housenumbercharlimiterrormessage.name: ./houseNumberCharLimitErrorMessage
housenumbercharlimiterrormessage.value: Your house number can have a maximum of 25 characters. Please enter your house number.

housenumberinvalidcharerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Invalid house number. The house number must not have special characters ($, @, #, !, %. * ^() ?)
housenumberinvalidcharerrormessage.name: ./houseNumberInvalidCharErrorMessage
housenumberinvalidcharerrormessage.value: Invalid house number. The house number must not have special characters ($, @, #, !, %. * ^() ?)

houseNumberEmptyErrorMessage.fieldDescription: Example: Please enter your house number. This field is mandatory.
houseNumberEmptyErrorMessage.name: ./houseNumberEmptyErrorMessage
houseNumberEmptyErrorMessage.value: Please enter your house number. This field is mandatory.

postcodemincharerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Your postcode must have at least 5 characters. Please enter your postcode.
postcodemincharerrormessage.fieldLabel: Post Code Min Character Limit Error Message
postcodemincharerrormessage.name: ./postCodeMinCharErrorMessage
postcodemincharerrormessage.value: Your postcode must have at least 5 characters. Please enter your postcode.

postcodemaxcharerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Your postcode can have a maximum of 10 characters. Please enter your postcode.
postcodemaxcharerrormessage.fieldLabel: Post Code Max Character Error Message
postcodemaxcharerrormessage.name: ./postCodeMaxCharErrorMessage
postcodemaxcharerrormessage.value: Your postcode can have a maximum of 10 characters. Please enter your postcode.

postcodeemptyerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Please enter your postcode. This field is mandatory.
postcodeemptyerrormessage.name: ./postCodeEmptyErrorMessage
postcodeemptyerrormessage.value: Please enter your postcode. This field is mandatory.

postcodeinvalidcharerrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: Invalid postcode. The postcode must not have special characters ($, @, #, !, %. * ^() ?)
postcodeinvalidcharerrormessage.fieldLabel: Post Code Invalid Character Error Message
postcodeinvalidcharerrormessage.name: ./postcodeInvalidCharErrorMessage
postcodeinvalidcharerrormessage.value: Invalid postcode. The postcode must not have special characters ($, @, #, !, %. * ^() ?)

citycharlimiterrormessage.fieldDescription: Example: The city name can have a maximum of 20 characters. Please enter your city.
citycharlimiterrormessage.name: ./cityCharLimitErrorMessage
citycharlimiterrormessage.value: The city name can have a maximum of 20 characters. Please enter your city.
